LanguageData.TD_CrazyCatLady.label: crazy cat lady
LanguageData.TD_CrazyCatLady.description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves cats. {PAWN_pronoun} loves every kind of cat, and wants to hug all of them, and wants them in a basket with bowties. {PAWN_nameDef} will be sad without cats, and happier with more cats in the colony. But {PAWN_pronoun} will also be distracted by them occasionally. And {PAWN_pronoun} loves to run, but is thinking about cats while running.
